oai_dc:dc.dc:description: ||kabbo's account of meeting a lion. While out walking in the veld, he sees a lion lying down and beats it with a stick on the head. The lion jumps up and runs away. ||kabbo is frightened by this encounter and stands watching the lion run away to lie down elsewhere, where it is joined by another lion. ||kabbo walks back home to tell his mother of his adventure and then goes to sleep in the house as the sun sets.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: ||kabbo's account of meeting with a lion
